body.name: Kleenex Expressions Ultra Soft Facial Tissues, 8 Flat Boxes, 120 Tissues per Box, 3-Ply, Packaging May Vary
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 42 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 8 FLAT BOXES: Each box of Kleenex Expressions Ultra Soft contains 120 tissues—packaging may vary from what is shown.
SOFT FACIAL TISSUE: America’s #1 preferred Ultra Tissue (vs Ultra national brands) softly comforts skin with 3 thick layers.
3-LAYER FACIAL TISSUE: 3 thick layers to comfort face and help protect hands for everyday use and during allergy season, back-to-school season, and cold and flu season.
HYPOALLERGENIC FACIAL TISSUE: Each box of hypoallergenic facial tissues has designs that can fit your home—contains various colors and designs.
GET FACIAL TISSUES DELIVERED: Skip the store and get Kleenex Expressions Ultra Soft delivered right to your door.
body.description: Tissues may be soft, but there’s only one Kleenex Expressions Ultra Soft—made with three thick layers for a perfect balance of softness and strength. Whether it's for cold and flu season, pollen allergies, or everything in between you'll have plenty for everyone with Kleenex Expressions Ultra Soft with 8 flat boxes of 120 ultra soft tissues. Designed for runny noses and watery eyes, our lotion-free and dye-free tissues have no added fragrance and feature soft, strong and absorbent care for face and hands. Plus, you can find a tissue box that’s attractive for your home in various colors and designs. 100% of our pulp is from responsibly managed forests. Want to nourish your skin? Try Kleenex Soothing Lotion Facial Tissues with Coconut Oil, Aloe and Vitamin E.

Are these cube or rectangular boxes? These are rectangular boxes. How big are Kleenex rectangular boxes (i.e. flat boxes)? More info on tissue box sizes? You got it! L x W x H Ultra Soft. Medium Flat. 8.875" x 4.75" x 3.4675" Ultra Soft. High Flat. 8.875" x 4.75" x 4.625" Ultra Soft. Low Flat. 8.875" x 4.75" x 2.28125" What is the ply count for each type of Kleenex Facial Tissue? Ultra Soft: 3-Ply Where are Kleenex facial tissues manufactured? The Kleenex Brand tissues you know and love are proudly made in the USA— South Carolina, Connecticut, Oklahoma—and Ontario, Canada. Are Kleenex sustainable? We support forestry practices that help conserve valuable forestlands, respect fundamental human rights and ensure a thriving ecosystem and a sustainable source of wood fiber for the future—100% of our pulp is from responsibly managed forests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft and absorbent. Good price when you use frequently like me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Winter sniffles need these tissues.I love being able to buy in bulk and this was a great deal compared to what I was paying at the store locally.These tissues are soft and easy on your skin. Whether you use them for the sniffles or to remove makeup, they are super gentle.You get 6 boxes. That's a lot of tissues for stocking up. Since 2 is 1 and 1 is none, I have backups for my backups. And, I'll be ordering more.Great, thick, soft tissues from a brand that's been around a long time.Love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We need to start using face towels instead of regular towels. These towels are just one use and it is of really good quantity, and it're really soft and think I wipe my hands after wiping my face off too and it does not tear apart

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cheap
reviews.reviewText: Great quality for a good price. Soft and absorbent, didnt irritate my nose and isnt thin like other brands that i have tried. Would recommend to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm a Puffs ultra user and have been for many years. I accidentally ordered this item a couple of months ago. I was angry with myself at first because the last time I tried Kleenex, it was nowhere near as good as Puffs. But these are really good tissues. Puffs ultra are still less expensive, though...by a couple dollars...so I'm staying with Puffs ultra. But my subscribe and save now includes Kleenex as my second/backup choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like these and the pice is right
reviews.reviewText: Not much to say about these. They are good quality. We do not like the "lotion" kind, and these without are great and soft.The one thing I will say that is relly not quality-rated is WHAT WERE THEY THINKING when they changed the box design ( color and pattern). These are the ugliest boxes you could come up with. Good thing I but fo the product and not the box art. It it was for the art image, these would be near the bottom of the list

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a box that was smaller than the 160 count that could fit in my work space and this fit perfectly.I like the plain kleenex version with no vitamin e, etc as that tends to make the kleenex not absorb as well. I also love the designs on these boxes.This has the best value for the pricePerfectly described and advertised. Was able to find them fast :)Very high qualityVery impressedItem was shipped without delay in perfect condition with no shipping logistics issue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these Kleenex 3 ply tissues. I have allergies and a constant drippy nose and these are wonderfully sturdy yet soft and don't irritate my face.
These are the best tissues by far.
Very nice toilet paper. Doesn't tear when you don't want it to and it is very soft.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wow still can’t believe Kleenex checked out of Canada
reviews.reviewText: Love these so very much they are 3 ply exactly what I like to touch my nose anything less is like sand paper not to mention the beauty they add to any room the box design and Colour just gorgeous. So I come back to buy some more and they jacked the price up from $13 to 41 whaaaaaat? And from 41 to $80 irregardless they are no longer available😟 these ones are double the size they have 120 other Kleenex with same design have 70.
Came in boxes with geometric designs! Not a bright colour in sight.

Pros the softness and durability of these tissues. I recently used 5 boxes during a bout of covid and I have no rawness under and around my nose. The durability is in the thickness you can blow all day and night and there is no snot leaking through and onto your hands. Cons the box design is kind of ugly to me, just not my style. It is bright and happy at least. I do not buy tissues based on the packaging I buy them for performance. I can not find Kleenex in stores anymore being in Canada. I was super happy to buy these on Amazon and they arrived the next day too. I hope they continue to be available. I will buy again.
